channel.title: CNN.com
channel.description: CNN.com delivers up-to-the-minute news and information on the latest top stories, weather, entertainment, politics and more.

image.title: CNN.com
image.description: CNN.com delivers up-to-the-minute news and information on the latest top stories, weather, entertainment, politics and more.

item.title: Ex-mayor sentenced for racketeering
item.description: Former Atlanta Mayor Bill Campbell was sentenced Tuesday to 30 months in prison and fined more than $6,000 for racketeering and tax evasion. The judge said that during the trial he "was overcome, almost appalled, at the breadth of misconduct in your administration," and that Campbell had been dishonest during a pre-sentencing investigation.

item.title: Web site: Al Qaeda IDs 20th September 11 hijacker
item.description: Al Qaeda identified a Saudi militant, who was killed in 2004, as the 20th hijacker in the September 11, 2001, attack on the United States, according to a statement published Tuesday on an Islamist Web site.

item.title: Alberto soaks Sunshine State
item.description: Florida authorities are warning people to stay off the streets until the danger from Tropical Storm Alberto passes -- but some locals are waving it off as "a mosquito breeze." About 21,000 houses and businesses were without electricity, and the storm provided an unexpected plus point, helping to extinguish wildfires that have plagued Florida for more than six weeks.

item.title: Bush makes surprise visit to Baghdad
item.description: President Bush, on a surprise visit to Baghdad, met today with Iraqi Prime Minister Nuri al-Maliki and the new leader's Cabinet. "It's in our interest that Iraq succeed," Bus said. "It's not only in the interest of the Iraqi people, it's in the interest of the American people, and for people who love freedom."

item.title: Zarqawi's 'lions' will fight on, Web post boasts
item.description: The newly named leader of al Qaeda in Iraq threatens to attack Sunni government officials in Baghdad's fortified Green Zone, according to a statement published Tuesday on a Web site often used by insurgents.

item.title: 'Overpriced' housing climbs higher
item.description: The rich have gotten richer, at least when it comes to home prices, according to a study released Monday.
